summary: Backup of my settings.May be useful to others with similar system.
descriptionHtml:
Backing up my settings,incase I need to reinstall,so I don't forget.It should work for other NVIDIA cards,and ini's should be ok for other types.If you wanna use it for yourself,please change the iSize W and iSizeH to your resolution,and change the sD3DDevice to your card(copy line from your's before replacing) before running launcher or Skyrim.

Update 1: I added the skyrim.ini you put in same place as the prefs,and the skyrim_default.ini you put in your main folder where Skyrim is installed.

Update 2:Changes image for new videocard settings for the 314 drivers.Basically use Supersampling at 2x-8x,instead of Multisampling.

Update 3:Use latest 331.65 drivers or better.Pretty much set Skyrim to Ultra with a few tweaks(you can use 4xAA but might have a small performance hit in open areas,also newer driver settings.It's balanced for a higher quality,and steady 30FPS,which keeps the card temps at about 45-50C.I also updated my PC specs,since things changed.You will notice mouse is a tiny bit laggy in menu,but it is fine ingame.

What I use/recommend...

Official Elder Scrolls HD pack (for any videocard with 2GB+ RAM preferably)
http://store.steampowered.com/dlc/72850/
Seems to work better for me on windows 8 64bit and a 1GB card,possibly cause it has metter memory management  on the OS.If you have issues like crashing,insert HighResTexturePack01.bsa, HighResTexturePack02.bsa, HighResTexturePack03.bsa to the sResourceArchiveList= line in your Skyrim_default.ini ,after Skyrim - Textures.bsa and disable(or delete) the ESP files for the HighRes packs.It'll fix the few glitches(firepit,chop block,and a few others),and let you use other packs without issues.

Unofficial Skyrim Patches:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19 (Skyrim)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25127 (Hearthfire)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23491 (Dawnguard)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31083 (Dragonborn)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31255 (HighRes pack)

Load Order in Data Files:
Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp
Hearthfires.esm
Unofficial Hearthfire Patch.esp
Dawnguard.esm
Unofficial Dawnguard Patch.esp

Other:
my own mountain texture replacer http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30920

My PC Specs (11-16-2013):
Athlon II X4 640
4GB RAM
EVGA GTX650 1GB
Windows 8.1 Preview
author: Belial666
